item.name: method
item.description: Type of screening used. **simple** for a constant dielectric constant, **distdep** for a distance-dependent screening. In the latter case screening length must be specified.

item.name: epsilon
item.description: Relative dielectric constant of the semiconductor.

item.name: screening
item.description: Screening length used in the distance-dependent screening.

item.name: cutoff
item.description: Cutoff in nm for coulomb interactions based on molecular centers of mass. If ommited, the whole box is taken.
